msg: The fix for the errors running the Autobahn test suite with perMessageDeflate was incorrect. The bug was only in trunk in the new handling for blocking writes. r1663325 broke non-blocking writes.

author: markt
msg: The fix for the errors running the Autobahn test suite with perMessageDeflate was incorrect. The root cause was in the new handling for blocking writes r1663324 fixed blocking writes but broke non-blocking writes.
